titles.title: POST Act of 2025
Personnel Oversight and Shift Tracking Act of 2025
POST Act of 2025

A bill to direct the Director of the Federal Protective Service to establish processes to strengthen oversight, performance, and accountability of contract security personnel engaged in the protection of certain buildings and grounds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
